DataList.LocalizeJP: ブル～…アーカイブ？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Blue~ Archive?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
아까 전에… 바닷가에서 성큼성큼
걸어가는 꽃게 씨를 발견했어.
선생님, 같이 보러 갈래?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
さっき…海辺でしゃかしゃか歩く、
ワタリガニさんを見つけたの。
先生、一緒に見にいこ？
DataList.LocalizeEN: I found a blue crab skittering along seashore. Do you want to see it with me, Sensei?

DataList.LocalizeJP: 涼しい～
DataList.LocalizeEN: The weather is cool~

DataList.LocalizeJP:
わあ、これって…
アイスクリーム？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Wa... Is this icecream?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
이 근처에,
꽃게 씨의 집을
만들자~
DataList.LocalizeJP:
この辺に、
ワタリガニさんの
お家を作ろう
DataList.LocalizeEN: Let's build a home for mister blue crab here.

DataList.LocalizeKR:
손수건 OK,
모종삽OK….
응, 이걸로 모래성,
만들 수 있겠네.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
ハンカチOK、
スコップOK…
うん、これで砂のお城、
作れそうだね
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Handkerchief OK,
Shovel OK...
Yeah, I think I can make a sand castle with this.

DataList.LocalizeKR:
음양부의 모두랑…
모래뺏기 게임이
하고 싶어.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
陰陽部の
みんなと砂山で
棒倒しとかしたいな
DataList.LocalizeEN: I want to try bo-taoshi with everyone in Yin-Yang club in sand moutain.

DataList.LocalizeKR:
어서 와. 선생님~
오늘은 어쩐 일이야?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
おかえり、先生
今日はどうしたの～？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Welcome back, Sensei. How was your day~?

DataList.LocalizeJP: 先生、久しぶり…
DataList.LocalizeEN: Sensei, long time no see...

DataList.LocalizeKR:
어? 오랜만이라고
할 정도는 아니야?
그럼 어디부터가 오랜만이야?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
あれ、久しぶりって
ほどじゃない？
どこからが久しぶり？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
It wasn't that long?
From where do you count the time?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
이번 여름엔,
좀 더 좋은 하이쿠를….
DataList.LocalizeJP:
この夏は、
もっと良い俳句をー…
DataList.LocalizeEN: I'm going to make better Haiku this summer...

DataList.LocalizeKR:
최근, 새로운
하이쿠를 지어봤어.
듣고 싶어?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
最近、
新しい俳句を作ったの
聞きたい？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
I recently wrote a new Haiku.
Do you want to hear it?

DataList.LocalizeJP: うん、分かった
DataList.LocalizeEN: Ok, listen

DataList.LocalizeJP:
夏が来て
熱くて冷えて
美味しいね
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Summer has come
It's hot, it's cold
It's good

DataList.LocalizeKR:
모처럼 여름이고,
좀 더 반짝반짝
빛나는 걸….
DataList.LocalizeJP:
せっかくの夏だし、
もっとキラキラしたものを…
DataList.LocalizeEN: It's summer after all, I want something more sparkling...

DataList.LocalizeJP: え、何を探してるのって？
DataList.LocalizeEN: What am I looking for?

DataList.LocalizeJP: …何だろうね？
DataList.LocalizeEN: I wonder it too

DataList.LocalizeKR:
사람은 열심히 하면
빛이 난다고 들었어.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
人は頑張ると、輝く
ことができるって聞いたの
DataList.LocalizeEN: I heard people shine brightest if they do their best.

DataList.LocalizeJP:
一体、どこが
光るんだろうね？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Do you know which part will shine?

DataList.LocalizeJP: …おでこ？
DataList.LocalizeEN: ...Forehead?

DataList.LocalizeJP: 今日って、先生の誕生日？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Is today your birthday?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
그럼 바로 생일 축하해~
선생님~ 오늘 같은 날이
있으니까, 나는
선생님을 만날 수 있었어….
DataList.LocalizeJP:
じゃあ早速お誕生日おめでとう、
先生～この日があるから、
私は先生に会えた…
DataList.LocalizeEN:
I wish a happy birthday to you then.
Sensei~ because of this day,
I was able to meet you...

DataList.LocalizeJP: うん、奇跡みたいだね
DataList.LocalizeEN: It's like a miracle.

DataList.LocalizeJP:
私の、誕生日…?
ありがとう、先生
DataList.LocalizeEN: My birthday...? Thank you, Sensei.

DataList.LocalizeKR:
아, 그러고 보니,
니야 부장이 선생님을
불러 오라고 하던데.
뭔가, 축하 파티를 한대.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
あ、そういえば、
ニヤ部長が先生を呼んできてって
言ってたよ何か、
お祝いパーティーをするんだって
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Oh, and president Niya told me to call you.
She will throw a party.

DataList.LocalizeJP:
…え、私の
誕生日パーティー？
そうなの？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Eh... My birthday party? Is that so?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
새해 복 많이 받아~
올해도 잘 부탁해~
선생님.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
あけましておめでとう～
今年もよろしくね、先生
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Happy New Year, Sensei.
I look forward to seeing you again this year, Sensei.

DataList.LocalizeJP: 先生、メリークリスマ～ス
DataList.LocalizeEN: Sensei, Merry Christmas.

DataList.LocalizeKR:
나는 올해,
착한 아이였을까?
그랬다면, 
나마하게는 안 오겠네~
DataList.LocalizeJP:
私は今年、良い子だったかな？
それなら、なまはげは来ないね
DataList.LocalizeEN: Have I been a good girl this year? If so, Namahage will not come to me.

DataList.LocalizeJP: え、ちょっと違う？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Eh, am I wrong?

DataList.LocalizeJP: トリック·オア·トリート～
DataList.LocalizeEN: Trick or treat~

DataList.LocalizeKR:
선생님은 어느 쪽? 트릭?
그럼 나, 오어를 할래.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
先生はどっち？トリック？
じゃあ私、オアをやるね
DataList.LocalizeEN: Which one, Sensei? Trick? I will play Ao-oni then...

DataList.LocalizeJP: …トリートは誰がやるのかな？
DataList.LocalizeEN: who will do the treats?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
이거, 주는 거야?
와~ 고마워~ 그럼 다음엔,
내가 줄 차례인가~?
답례, 기대하고 있어~
DataList.LocalizeJP:
これ、くれるの？
わぁ、ありがと～。
じゃあ次は、私の番かな～？
お返し、楽しみにしててね～
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Can I have this? Waa, thank you.
Next time will be my turn? Please look forward to seeing my return.
